Summary: It flew slow was square,hovered,noiseless,then flew off at the speed of light
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Palm Harbor
There were no other sightings in Palm Harbor on or around January 20th 2007
divs: sighting detailson or about jan 20th 2007 i was driving back from my girlfriends house at about 3am.i was actually on the phone with her when i saw the ufo.anyway i lived in tarpon springs florida at the time and was coming back from clearwater about a 25 min ride.i was driving driving north on cr1\keene\omaha there all the same road.anyway i came to the light at cr1 and curlew,as i went through the light i noticed a strange figure flying to my left.it had a weird light pattern.the lights went all the way around.at this point i was thinking holy [expletive deleted] its either a ufo or a weird light system some individual has on a personal aircraft.nevertheless i am watching all the way down cr1 it appeared to be barely moving for a plane and all.anyway it appeared to be following me,it was only maybe 4oo feet away or it seemed.this is not a desolate area its very populated.when i got to tampa rd and cr1 i had to make a left.as i turned i noticed it was following me.down the road.as i approached tampa rd and alt 19 which was less the 45 seconds away it stopped about 50 feet to the left of my car.i could plainly see the shape it was square.it had a interesting light pattern that consist of light blue,light pink,white the blue and pink were very light though almost white.meanwhile i am watching it with my head out the window for a good 15 to 20 seconds.i looked over and there was a cop also at the opposite light he appeared to be looking at it as well.it made a left turn with no noise and just took off like at the speed of light.i was amazed and freaked out at the same time.all the while my girlfriend is on the phone with me.i am telling her play by play she is laughing at me.i said to her "i am [expletive deleted] serious".i dont care if people believe me i know what i saw if anyone wants to chat or have seen something similar my email is [personal info removed] mike
